name: Project Scar
description:
Project Scar is a platform game and Endless Runner, enemies and platforms are randomly generated. You are Scar, the Traveler of the worlds, one day you traveled to a hostile world full of great Goblins (Skull, Red and Green) who stole your travel ship and left you in an endless jungle. Go as far as you can by getting high scores, but it won't be easy. Dodge, escape and defeat the enemies that will chase you. Keep moving or you'll end up sealing your fate.

Have fun and break your records to show off to friends and family, spend time controlling Scar and kill Goblins or run away from them, each new game a new challenge with random appearances and random platforms.
